about_the_game:
This is a Low-priced practical erotic game.
You make a “My fair lady.”

《Contents》

  • 15 separate CGs (80 CGs in total!)
  • 15 H-scenes
  • Japanese voice acting for the female characters

《Story》


"What a horrible smell."

Although this is an area within the castle lands,
this is an area where mostly peasants live.
There is a large garbage heap hidden in the shadow of a building.
I notice a small figure buried in the garbage.

"Are you a woman?"

The dirty girl nods curtly.
I take that girl home.
When we return to the mansion, I make her take a bath, clothe her…
Then, I am proud to say I can see just how fine a woman she is.
The woman in front of me
shines with a purity no other person has.

《Character》


■Chien
CV: Hina Shinomiya
Bust 83cm ／ Waist 52cm ／ Hips 82cm

She was abandoned and lived on the streets.
Thankfully, no one has assaulted her.
Richard finds her while she's still a virgin.
Without knowing why, she was taken to his mansion and underwent training with no choice in the matter.

*Before purchasing this product, we highly recommend that you play the demo [Japanese only] to check if the game works properly on your computer in your region.
*Appetite is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please contact Tensei Games.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and sexual scenes. Within those, there are also scenes that are possible to be interpreted as sexual violence or non-consensual sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 / AMD Athlon64 and over
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 X 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit) recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 / AMD Athlon64 and over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 X 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit) recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound

reviews:
“ＣＧのクオリティは塗り、原画共に高めで、個人的な購入の決め手はサンプルＣＧとヒロインのキャラデザによるものだったのだが、絵買いを後悔しないレベルのクオリティだった。~ The quality of the CGs, both colored and original, is high. My personal decision to buy this is based on the sample CGs and the character design of the heroine, but the quality is at a level where I don't regret buying this because of the CGs.”
70 – ErogameScape -エロゲー批評空間-
short_description: Low-priced practical erotic game! The eccentric noble Richard finds a girl, Chien, in a peasant town. He starts "training" to educate this girl, who is no more than a stray dog, ​​into his favorite mistress.
